original_title: 台北爸爸，紐約媽媽（未完成）
overview: In 2011, Mickey Chen wrote an autobiography about his torn-apart family and his life as the gay eldest son. Since he passed away in December 2018, this documentary film of the same name was left unfinished but shows enough promise and paints a heartbreaking portrait of his troubled family.
title: Taipei Dad, New York Mom (Unfinished)
